trans-unit.source: Bibtex file support to easily include publication lists.
trans-unit.target: 支持Bibtex文件,可轻松收录出版物清单。

trans-unit.source: By name: the name has to show up in the author list to be included
trans-unit.target: 按姓名:姓名必须出现在作者名单中才能被收录。

trans-unit.source: Create a file configs/bibtex-support.ini with a section called Bibtex. Define a variable files that is a white space separated list of bibtex files. Put these files into the assets directory of your project.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个configs/bibtex-support.ini文件,其中有一个名为Bibtex的部分。定义一个变量文件,它是一个用空格分隔的bibtex文件列表。将这些文件放到项目的assets目录下。

trans-unit.source: For the default template, you can also add the following javascript to show some entries if you have a long list (relies on jquery):
trans-unit.target: 对于默认模板,如果你有一个长长的列表,你也可以添加以下javascript来显示一些条目(依赖于jquery)。

trans-unit.source: Optionally you can also create a template file that should leave in the template directory to render the bibtex entries. If you skip this entry a default template will be used that sorts the entries by year.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以选择创建一个模板文件,留在模板目录下以呈现bibtex条目。如果你跳过这个条目,将使用一个默认的模板,按年份对条目进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The arguments are optional and can be used for filtering.
trans-unit.target: 参数是可选的,可用于过滤。

trans-unit.source: The plugin allows adding a list of publications generated from bibtex files to a page.
trans-unit.target: 该插件允许在页面中添加由bibtex文件生成的出版物列表。

trans-unit.source: To enable the plugin add this to your project file:
trans-unit.target: 要启用该插件,请将此添加到你的项目文件中。

trans-unit.source: You can add the the publication anywhere in your jinja template by calling
trans-unit.target: 你可以在jinja模板的任何地方通过调用

trans-unit.source: by year: only publications from this year
trans-unit.target: 按年份划分:只包括今年的出版物

trans-unit.source: fname: white space separated list files to search (by default all files will be searched)
trans-unit.target: fname:以空格分隔的搜索列表文件(默认情况下会搜索所有文件

trans-unit.source: labels: white space separated list of bibtex labels (the name of each entry in the bibtex file)
trans-unit.target: 标签:以空格分隔的bibtex标签列表(bibtex文件中每个条目的名称)。
